channel.title: ProductV2BO on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in ProductV2BO on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Filter Products
item.description: BO - Filter Products Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products * Products list page is displayed correctly * No filter by default. All products are displayed Filter the list by ID > Add a number on “min” and “max” field below “ID” in column > Click on “Search” button on the right of the table * Products list is filtered between the 4 and 10 IDs

item.title: BO - CRUD Standard product
item.description: BO - CRUD Standard product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products Products list page is displayed correctly Click on “New product” button on the top right of the page > Choose “Standard product” block in the modal * A modal “Add new product” is displayed * A description by type is displayed. For Standard product: “A physical product that needs to be shipped.

item.title: BO - CRUD Product with combinations
item.description: BO - CRUD Product with combinations Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products Products list page is displayed correctly Click on “New product” button on the top right of the page > Choose “Product with combinations” block in the modal * A modal “Add new product” is displayed * A description by type is displayed. For Standard product: “A product with different variations (size, color, etc.

item.title: BO - CRUD Pack of products
item.description: BO - CRUD Pack of products Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products Products list page is displayed correctly Click on “New product” button on the top right of the page > Choose “Pack of products” block in the modal * A modal “Add new product” is displayed * A description by type is displayed. For Pack of products: “A collection of products from your catalog.

item.title: BO - Delete product
item.description: BO - Delete product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products Products list page is displayed correctly Click on “New product” button on the top right of the page > Choose “Standard product” block in the modal * A modal “Add new product” is displayed * A description by type is displayed. For Standard product: “A physical product that needs to be shipped.

item.title: BO - Delete product with bulk actions
item.description: BO - Delete product with bulk actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products Products list page is displayed correctly Click on “New product” button on the top right of the page > Choose “Standard product” block in the modal * A modal “Add new product” is displayed * A description by type is displayed. For Standard product: “A physical product that needs to be shipped.

item.title: BO - CRUD Virtual product
item.description: BO - CRUD Virtual product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products Products list page is displayed correctly Click on “New product” button on the top right of the page > Choose “Virtual product” block in the modal * A modal “Add new product” is displayed * A description by type is displayed. For Standard product: " An intangible product that doesn’t require shipping.
